name: Kalimudah
description:
Introduction

Kalimudah is easy and beautifull descent located in GitGit area on Bali Island and practicable throughout the year.

Approach

Descent

Jumps (one of 5m â€“ optional), swim, natural water slides, rappels (15m maximum), in the second part of the canyon - wonderful sequences of plants-covered, volcanic rock and natural warm spring basins encountered at the end.

Exit

Red tape
